ygData.subject: Re: Again where and where ?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yakos, The spells you are looking for may not be around the wizard s section of the Arcane College.  Look at EVERY merchant in the whole place....this will
ygData.messageBody:
Yakos,

The spells you are looking for may not be around the wizard's
section of the Arcane College. Look at EVERY merchant in the whole
place....this will mean going up to everyone and right clicking them. Think
about it, Shielding (new shield spell available) is available to more than
just wizards (all mages I think) and you can also use Invisibility (rank 2
Magician spell). You will find them there...trust me. Keep looking on all
floors and levels. Also, be sure to buy shieldskin if you plan on soloing
or want that extra protection from hits. Then make damn sure you buy about
10 Cat's Eye Agate gems from the merchant lady when you first get teleported
into the guild.

- Ziffnab
18th Wizard...Xegony

-----Original Message-----
From: Riviere Stephane [mailto:Stephane.Riviere@...]

spel.. At the wizzard guild, there is only let s say 10 wizzard spel and
early one :( Anyone knows if there is a secret house or something like that

the door located under water in the magical hall in freeport ???

thanks for all

yakos

level 15 3/4 wizzard :)

p.s. ho and yes any good information about research would be appreciated too

this book the rune for the spel then hit combine : yeah but can we miss ???
if yes it is going to be real hard for us !!! Rune are sold about 5 pp
!!!!!!
